sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function MuseumSinglePage({allTheMuseumData}) { let {smug} = useParams() console.log(smug) console.log(allTheMuseumData) let currentMuseumPage = allTheMuseumData.filter(f=> f.id === smug) console.log(currentMuseumPage) return (

price: {currentMuseumPage[0].price}

address:{currentMuseumPage[0].address}

{currentMuseumPage.filter(f=>f.directions ?

dirrections{f.directions}

: null) }

time:{currentMuseumPage[0].time}

tel: {currentMuseumPage[0].tel}

{currentMuseumPage[0].title}

{currentMuseumPage[0].text}

) }
